<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Alicorn Lance](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1882)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Holy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=517" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 36 <sup>2.0</sup>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) The version of the alicorn lance which does void damage may not be purchased or crafted in Pathfinder Society play._

**Price** 150 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Lance](/Weapons.aspx?ID=28)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This white _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [lance](/Weapons.aspx?ID=28)_ is made from the horn of a [unicorn](/Monsters.aspx?ID=397), willingly granted at the end of its lifetime. In addition to its normal damage, it deals 1 spirit damage on successful attacks. You can make the lance glow like a [torch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=60) or suppress its light by using an action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You evoke the spirit of the unicorn that donated the _alicorn lance's_ horn, which you ride in a shining charge. Move up to twice your Speed and make a Strike with the _alicorn lance_; you gain the effects of the lance's [jousting](/Traits.aspx?ID=186) trait on this Strike. If you were already mounted when you Activate the horn, the unicorn spirit takes shape around your steed, granting it a +10–foot status bonus to its Speed for the charge.

**Craft Requirements** The initial raw materials must include a horn willingly gifted by a unicorn. In rare instances, an _alicorn lance_ can be made with a forcibly taken horn. However this heinous act pollutes the horn's magic, causing it to glow with a sickly red light; remove the holy trait, add the [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521) trait to Strikes instead of the holy trait, and make the unicorn spirit evoked in the charge whinny visibly in pain.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
